cards.name: list players
cards.description: Returns a list of players objects. You can filter the results by passing itemsPerPage, page, search, orderBy and orderDirection parameters.

params.search: search term to filter the results (optional)
params.orderBy: field to order the results by (optional)
params.orderDirection: direction to order the results by (asc or desc) (optional)
